text: It's probably your recycleview, doesn't work well with wrap content, that's solved in the upcoming version
jesus christ, can we get one fucking release of Android that doesn’t introduce new bugs
ffs
does anyone know why GLES20 static methods and properties are returning null in Marshmallow?
because it’s Android? :joy:
*cries*
and of course, the documentation on this stuff is absolute dogshit
<@U0A0S0WG0>: what methods?
I’m trying to do something as simple as use GLES30/GLES20.GL_RENDERER to get the GPU
in 5.1.1 and below, it gives you a human readable string telling you the gpu in the phone
marshmallow just says fuck you and gives you null
there is no documentation of it in the changelogs, and the javadocs might as well be toilet paper for as helpful as they are
<@U0A0S0WG0>: you have an open GL context, yeah?
yar
because that’s why they’d return NULL
if you don’t have a valid context
